meanings.sent1: The unsanctioned party in the park was shut down by the police.
meanings.sent2: The unsanctioned event was not allowed to take place in the school auditorium.
meanings.sent3: The unsanctioned picnic turned into a fun adventure in the nearby woods.
meanings.sent4: Her unsanctioned decision to skip class was met with consequences.
meanings.sent5: The unsanctioned graffiti on the wall caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: Not authorized or endorsed by an authority.
meanings.sent1: The unsanctioned protest caused chaos in the city streets.
meanings.sent2: The unsanctioned merchandise was not allowed to be sold at the event.
meanings.sent3: His unsanctioned attempt to fix the broken clock only made it worse.
meanings.sent4: The unsanctioned experiment led to unexpected results.
meanings.sent5: The unsanctioned speech stirred up controversy among the listeners.

meanings.definition: Not sanctioned or supported by a governing body.
meanings.sent1: The unsanctioned team was not eligible to compete in the tournament.
meanings.sent2: The unsanctioned organization operated outside the established rules.
meanings.sent3: Their unsanctioned decision to hold a secret meeting raised suspicions.
meanings.sent4: The unsanctioned construction project faced legal challenges.
meanings.sent5: The unsanctioned rally gathered a small but passionate crowd.
